#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t,x,y,h;
string s;
char c;
cin>>t;
for(x=1;x<=t;x++)
{
cin>>s;
h=0;
for(y=0;y<s.size();y++)
{
c=s[y];
if (c=='A' || c=='D' || c=='O' || c=='P' || c=='R' || c=='Q')
h=h+1;
else if(c=='B')
h=h+2;
}
cout<<h<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
